channel.title: Pages on Josia's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Josia's Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
Hey there,

My name is Josia Scheytt ([josˈiːa ʃaɪ̯t]). I live in the South of Germany near Stuttgart.

Technically, I am interested in all things DevOps and Cloud Automation. My life as a whole is about following The One and Only, Jesus.

This blog serves mostly as a small utility to keep track of things I have learned, but also as a way of sharing knowledge. For me this is a vital part of living DevOps.

You can find me on:

  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
